highlights: NIRF 2025 Rank: 101-150 Overall, 36th in Law, 55th in Pharmacy, Top 50 in Innovation
QS World University Rankings 2026: 15th Private University in India, 43rd Overall in India
Times Higher Education 2025: 1001-1200 globally, 45th in India
THE Impact Rankings 2025: 2nd in India for SDG 16 (Peace & Justice), 3rd for SDG 10 (Reduced Inequalities)
THE Subject Rankings 2025: 601-800 band for Business & Economics, Computer Science
India Today Best Universities 2025: 9th among private general universities
NAAC A+ accreditation (Score: 3.37/4 - Only private university in Uttar Pradesh with A+ in first cycle)
AACSB accredited School of Business (Elite business school accreditation)

campus.description: Well-designed campus with contemporary architecture and green spaces

academic.programs: Diverse range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs
academic.classrooms: Smart classrooms with Wi-Fi connectivity and modern technology
academic.labs: Advanced science and engineering laboratories including specialized computer labs
academic.library: Well-stocked library with books, journals, and digital resources

accommodation.hostels: Secure hostels for boys and girls

placement.description: Strong placement record with leading companies

techPlacements.cse: Excellent placement opportunities in top tech companies
techPlacements.dataScience: Growing opportunities in data science roles

studentSupport.internships: Industry internship opportunities in 3rd and 4th years
studentSupport.training: Placement training programs, mock interviews, coding bootcamps

business.aacsb: AACSB accredited School of Business - Elite business school accreditation
business.description: One of the few universities in India with AACSB accreditation for business programs

btech.conditions: 60% scholarship for all B.Tech courses - No GPA requirement

others.conditions: 50% scholarship for all other courses - No GPA requirement
